attributes.action: call on the EU to legislate for a standard type of recyclable plastic for all goods produced or purchased within the EU and to adopt all such legislation within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to standardise plastic production throuhout the European Union and to ensure that all plastic produced can be recyled.. To adopt such measures within the UK as soon as possible inorder to reduce landfill and waste.
